title: Introducing: Lauren Scrivener
body:
Southampton’s Lauren Scrivener perhaps doesn’t have the sort of ‘enigma’ status that the likes of Lorde or BANKS have, yet her music is equally as alluring and majestic.

With a collection of tracks recorded over the past couple of years, it was blog-brother [Breaking More Waves](http://www.breakingmorewaves.blogspot.co.uk/2014/04/lauren-scrivener-waiting-for-you.html) that alerted me to her presence. What really attracted me to her is the development her sound has taken on, one that is all too clear to witness from her Soundcloud, from the much more raw, rough round the edges, instrumental Reflection, to the pirouetting beauty of her most recent upload, Waiting For You. There’s some really great ideas going on here, and whilst it’s far from a ‘finished product’ in terms of music industry potential, that’s often the most exciting point to hear an artist at. Check out a couple of her tracks below, and more on [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/lauren-scrivener).
